info.title: NetworkManagementClient
info.description: The Microsoft Azure Network management API provides a RESTful set of web services that interact with Microsoft Azure Networks service to manage your network resources. The API has entities that capture the relationship between an end user and the Microsoft Azure Networks service.

put.description: Creates or updates a virtual network gateway in the specified resource group.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group.

parameters.name: virtualNetworkGatewayName
parameters.description: The name of the virtual network gateway.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: Parameters supplied to create or update virtual network gateway operation.

200.description: Update successful. The operation returns the resulting VirtualNetworkGateway resource.

201.description: Create successful. The operation returns the resulting VirtualNetworkGateway resource.

get.description: Gets the specified virtual network gateway by resource group.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group.

parameters.name: virtualNetworkGatewayName
parameters.description: The name of the virtual network gateway.

200.description: Request successful. The operation returns a VirtualNetworkGateway resource.

delete.description: Deletes the specified virtual network gateway.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group.

parameters.name: virtualNetworkGatewayName
parameters.description: The name of the virtual network gateway.

202.description: Accepted and the operation will complete asynchronously.

get.description: Gets all virtual network gateways by resource group.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group.

200.description: Request successful. The operation returns a list of VirtualNetworkGateway resources.

post.description: Resets the primary of the virtual network gateway in the specified resource group.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group.

parameters.name: virtualNetworkGatewayName
parameters.description: The name of the virtual network gateway.

parameters.name: gatewayVip
parameters.description: Virtual network gateway vip address supplied to the begin reset of the active-active feature enabled gateway.

202.description: Accepted and the operation will complete asynchronously.

200.description: Request successful. The operation reset the primary of the virtual network gateway.

post.description: Generates VPN client package for P2S client of the virtual network gateway in the specified resource group.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group.

parameters.name: virtualNetworkGatewayName
parameters.description: The name of the virtual network gateway.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: Parameters supplied to the generate virtual network gateway VPN client package operation.

post.description: The GetBgpPeerStatus operation retrieves the status of all BGP peers.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group.

parameters.name: virtualNetworkGatewayName
parameters.description: The name of the virtual network gateway.

parameters.name: peer
parameters.description: The IP address of the peer to retrieve the status of.

202.description: Accepted and the operation will complete asynchronously.

post.description: This operation retrieves a list of routes the virtual network gateway has learned, including routes learned from BGP peers.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group.

parameters.name: virtualNetworkGatewayName
parameters.description: The name of the virtual network gateway.

202.description: Accepted and the operation will complete asynchronously.

post.description: This operation retrieves a list of routes the virtual network gateway is advertising to the specified peer.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group.

parameters.name: virtualNetworkGatewayName
parameters.description: The name of the virtual network gateway.

parameters.name: peer
parameters.description: The IP address of the peer

202.description: Accepted and the operation will complete asynchronously.

put.description: Creates or updates a virtual network gateway connection in the specified resource group.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group.

parameters.name: virtualNetworkGatewayConnectionName
parameters.description: The name of the virtual network gateway connection.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: Parameters supplied to the create or update virtual network gateway connection operation.

200.description: Update successful. The operation returns the resulting VirtualNetworkGatewayConnection resource.

201.description: Create successful. The operation returns the resulting VirtualNetworkGatewayConnection resource.

get.description: Gets the specified virtual network gateway connection by resource group.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group.

parameters.name: virtualNetworkGatewayConnectionName
parameters.description: The name of the virtual network gateway connection.

200.description: Request successful. The operation returns the resulting VirtualNetworkPeering resource.

delete.description: Deletes the specified virtual network Gateway connection.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group.

parameters.name: virtualNetworkGatewayConnectionName
parameters.description: The name of the virtual network gateway connection.

202.description: Accepted and the operation will complete asynchronously.

put.description: The Put VirtualNetworkGatewayConnectionSharedKey operation sets the virtual network gateway connection shared key for passed virtual network gateway connection in the specified resource group through Network resource provider.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group.

parameters.name: virtualNetworkGatewayConnectionName
parameters.description: The virtual network gateway connection name.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: Parameters supplied to the Begin Set Virtual Network Gateway connection Shared key operation throughNetwork resource provider.

200.description: Request successful. The operation returns the resulting ConnectionSharedKey resource.

get.description: The Get VirtualNetworkGatewayConnectionSharedKey operation retrieves information about the specified virtual network gateway connection shared key through Network resource provider.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group.

parameters.name: virtualNetworkGatewayConnectionName
parameters.description: The virtual network gateway connection shared key name.

200.description: Request successful. The operation returns a list of VirtualNetworkGatewayConnection resources.

get.description: The List VirtualNetworkGatewayConnections operation retrieves all the virtual network gateways connections created.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group.

200.description: Request successful. The operation resets the virtual network gateway connection shared key.

post.description: The VirtualNetworkGatewayConnectionResetSharedKey operation resets the virtual network gateway connection shared key for passed virtual network gateway connection in the specified resource group through Network resource provider.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group.

parameters.name: virtualNetworkGatewayConnectionName
parameters.description: The virtual network gateway connection reset shared key Name.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: Parameters supplied to the begin reset virtual network gateway connection shared key operation through network resource provider.

200.description: Request successful. The operation sets the virtual network gateway connection shared key.

put.description: Creates or updates a local network gateway in the specified resource group.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group.

parameters.name: localNetworkGatewayName
parameters.description: The name of the local network gateway.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: Parameters supplied to the create or update local network gateway operation.

201.description: Create successful. The operation returns the resulting LocalNetworkGateway resource.

200.description: Update successful. The operation returns the resulting LocalNetworkGateway resource.

get.description: Gets the specified local network gateway in a resource group.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group.

parameters.name: localNetworkGatewayName
parameters.description: The name of the local network gateway.

200.description: Request successful. The operation returns the resulting LocalNetworkGateway resource.

delete.description: Deletes the specified local network gateway.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group.

parameters.name: localNetworkGatewayName
parameters.description: The name of the local network gateway.

202.description: Accepted and the operation will complete asynchronously.

get.description: Gets all the local network gateways in a resource group.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group.

200.description: Request successful. The operation returns a list of LocalNetworkGateway resources.

privateIPAllocationMethod.description: The private IP allocation method. Possible values are: 'Static' and 'Dynamic'.

subnet.description: The reference of the subnet resource.

publicIPAddress.description: The reference of the public IP resource.

provisioningState.description: The provisioning state of the public IP resource. Possible values are: 'Updating', 'Deleting', and 'Failed'.

name.description: The name of the resource that is unique within a resource group. This name can be used to access the resource.

etag.description: A unique read-only string that changes whenever the resource is updated.

VirtualNetworkGatewayIPConfiguration.description: IP configuration for virtual network gateway

ipConfigurations.description: IP configurations for virtual network gateway.

gatewayType.description: The type of this virtual network gateway. Possible values are: 'Vpn' and 'ExpressRoute'.

vpnType.description: The type of this virtual network gateway. Possible values are: 'PolicyBased' and 'RouteBased'.

enableBgp.description: Whether BGP is enabled for this virtual network gateway or not.

gatewayDefaultSite.description: The reference of the LocalNetworkGateway resource which represents local network site having default routes. Assign Null value in case of removing existing default site setting.

sku.description: The reference of the VirtualNetworkGatewaySku resource which represents the SKU selected for Virtual network gateway.

vpnClientConfiguration.description: The reference of the VpnClientConfiguration resource which represents the P2S VpnClient configurations.

bgpSettings.description: Virtual network gateway's BGP speaker settings.

resourceGuid.description: The resource GUID property of the VirtualNetworkGateway resource.

provisioningState.description: The provisioning state of the VirtualNetworkGateway resource. Possible values are: 'Updating', 'Deleting', and 'Failed'.
The provisioning state of the VPN client root certificate resource. Possible values are: 'Updating', 'Deleting', and 'Failed'.

VpnClientRootCertificatePropertiesFormat.description: Properties of SSL certificates of application gateway

name.description: The name of the resource that is unique within a resource group. This name can be used to access the resource.

etag.description: A unique read-only string that changes whenever the resource is updated.

VpnClientRootCertificate.description: VPN client root certificate of virtual network gateway

thumbprint.description: The revoked VPN client certificate thumbprint.

provisioningState.description: The provisioning state of the VPN client revoked certificate resource. Possible values are: 'Updating', 'Deleting', and 'Failed'.

VpnClientRevokedCertificatePropertiesFor.description: Properties of the revoked VPN client certificate of virtual network gateway.

name.description: The name of the resource that is unique within a resource group. This name can be used to access the resource.

etag.description: A unique read-only string that changes whenever the resource is updated.

VpnClientRevokedCertificate.description: VPN client revoked certificate of virtual network gateway.

vpnClientAddressPool.description: The reference of the address space resource which represents Address space for P2S VpnClient.

name.description: Gateway SKU name. Possible values are: 'Basic', 'HighPerformance','Standard', and 'UltraPerformance'.

tier.description: Gateway SKU tier. Possible values are: 'Basic', 'HighPerformance','Standard', and 'UltraPerformance'.

bgpPeeringAddress.description: The BGP peering address and BGP identifier of this BGP speaker.

peerWeight.description: The weight added to routes learned from this BGP speaker.

localAddress.description: The virtual network gateway's local address

asn.description: The autonomous system number of the remote BGP peer

connectedDuration.description: For how long the peering has been up

routesReceived.description: The number of routes learned from this peer

messagesSent.description: The number of BGP messages sent

messagesReceived.description: The number of BGP messages received

sourcePeer.description: The peer this route was learned from

origin.description: The source this route was learned from

etag.description: Gets a unique read-only string that changes whenever the resource is updated.

VirtualNetworkGateway.description: A common class for general resource information

ProcessorArchitecture.description: VPN client Processor Architecture. Possible values are: 'AMD64' and 'X86'.

value.description: Gets a list of VirtualNetworkGateway resources that exists in a resource group.

nextLink.description: The URL to get the next set of results.

VirtualNetworkGatewayListResult.description: Response for the ListVirtualNetworkGateways API service call.

BgpPeerStatusListResult.description: Response for list BGP peer status API service call

GatewayRouteListResult.description: List of virtual network gateway routes

ingressBytesTransferred.description: The Ingress Bytes Transferred in this connection

egressBytesTransferred.description: The Egress Bytes Transferred in this connection

lastConnectionEstablishedUtcTime.description: The time at which connection was established in Utc format.

connectionType.description: Gateway connection type. Possible values are: 'IPsec','Vnet2Vnet','ExpressRoute', and 'VPNClient.

connectionStatus.description: Virtual network Gateway connection status. Possible values are 'Unknown', 'Connecting', 'Connected' and 'NotConnected'.

tunnelConnectionStatus.description: Collection of all tunnels' connection health status.

egressBytesTransferred.description: The egress bytes transferred in this connection.

ingressBytesTransferred.description: The ingress bytes transferred in this connection.

resourceGuid.description: The resource GUID property of the VirtualNetworkGatewayConnection resource.

provisioningState.description: The provisioning state of the VirtualNetworkGatewayConnection resource. Possible values are: 'Updating', 'Deleting', and 'Failed'.

etag.description: Gets a unique read-only string that changes whenever the resource is updated.

VirtualNetworkGatewayConnection.description: A common class for general resource information

value.description: Gets a list of VirtualNetworkGatewayConnection resources that exists in a resource group.

nextLink.description: The URL to get the next set of results.

VirtualNetworkGatewayConnectionListResul.description: Response for the ListVirtualNetworkGatewayConnections API service call

keyLength.description: The virtual network connection reset shared key length, should between 1 and 128.

value.description: The virtual network connection shared key value.

ConnectionSharedKey.description: Response for GetConnectionSharedKey API service call

gatewayIpAddress.description: IP address of local network gateway.

bgpSettings.description: Local network gateway's BGP speaker settings.

resourceGuid.description: The resource GUID property of the LocalNetworkGateway resource.

provisioningState.description: The provisioning state of the LocalNetworkGateway resource. Possible values are: 'Updating', 'Deleting', and 'Failed'.

etag.description: A unique read-only string that changes whenever the resource is updated.

LocalNetworkGateway.description: A common class for general resource information

value.description: A list of local network gateways that exists in a resource group.

nextLink.description: The URL to get the next set of results.

LocalNetworkGatewayListResult.description: Response for ListLocalNetworkGateways API service call.

SubscriptionIdParameter.name: subscriptionId
SubscriptionIdParameter.description: The subscription credentials which uniquely identify the Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.
